apply 1.hcl
cmpshow users 1.sql

# Change enum default.
apply 2.hcl
cmpshow users 2.sql

-- 1.hcl --
schema "$db" {}

enum "status" {
    schema = schema.$db
    values = ["active", "inactive"]
}

table "users" {
  schema = schema.$db
  column "type" {
    type = enum.status
    default = "active"
  }
}

-- 1.sql --
             Table "script_column_enum.users"
 Column |  Type  | Collation | Nullable |     Default
--------+--------+-----------+----------+------------------
 type   | status |           | not null | 'active'::status


-- 2.hcl --
schema "$db" {}

enum "status" {
    schema = schema.$db
    values = ["active", "inactive"]
}

table "users" {
  schema = schema.$db
  column "type" {
    type = enum.status
    default = "inactive"
  }
}

-- 2.sql --
              Table "script_column_enum.users"
 Column |  Type  | Collation | Nullable |      Default
--------+--------+-----------+----------+--------------------
 type   | status |           | not null | 'inactive'::status
